summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven features, including automatic article summaries, multi-AI service support, intelligent content cleaning, and efficient caching. It also offers intelligent reading statistics, such as character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. Additional features include automatic language recognition, content type detection, performance optimization, and error handling. Installation methods and quick start guides are provided for easy integration into MkDocs projects. The project supports multiple languages and provides customizable configuration options for precise control.
